website_summaries.verdict: You'll get a lot of bells and whistles, but competitors provide similar performance at a fraction of the price.
pros: Garners praise for its ability to store numerous customized entry codes and compatibility with most doors

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I dislike is the fact that automatically locks when you put ...
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these at my house connected to my SmartThings hub. You'll want to use non-rechargeable batteries or you'll be replacing them all of the time. The only thing I dislike is the fact that automatically locks when you put something like your hand in front of it. It's a convenient trick, by my family is constantly accidentally locking opened doors by walking too closely to the faceplate. It's minor but annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Matt K.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working in One Year
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Yale Touchscreen Deadbolt. The first stopped working 2 days following install. The second one stopped working a little over a year after install - both had the same issue when locked the deadbolt could not be unlocked using the touchscreen - It appears the internal gears are plastic and have stripped. I can not recommend a Yale Deadbolt due to the inferior quality.
customer_reviews.author: dmbTank

customer_reviews.title: Nice lock system
customer_reviews.text: Nice lock system, works great. You can set up to a 6 digit security code and do a bunch of features. The on caution is the module to connect the lock to your alarm in NOT included. If you are going to purchase the module make sure to contact the manufacture to get the correct module because only certain module models will work with alarms and models series etc. Best to call the manufacturer and they will sometimes give you a discount or coupon code.
customer_reviews.author: SEAN A. DESROCHERS

customer_reviews.title: No battery life
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by our security company and has turned out to be a huge and expensive disappointment. The batteries don't last more than two days and there is no key option. It cost us $130 after coming home from a vacation for a locksmith to show us a trick with the 9 V battery. For the price of this thing I should not have to carry around a 9 V battery in my purse!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: screen fades
customer_reviews.text: I have had this lock for two years now. It works as expected except that if you happen to have it exposed to direct sunlight the screen will fade and be difficult to see over time. We can now barely read the keypad and our finger prints have basically been burnt into the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Mktexpress

customer_reviews.title: Touchscreen goes bad
customer_reviews.text: Same experience as others. The deadbolt worked well for about 18 months, then the touchscreen started to malfunction. I could sometimes get it to come on, but would not function well enough to accept a code and unlock. I have not tried Yale customer service yet, but based on other reviews, I don't have high hopes. The Z-Wave functions still work, and the mechanics of the deadbolt are fine, other than the touchscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Locksmith showed me how to pick this lock in less than 60 seconds
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item. My locksmith showed me how to pick this lock in under 60 seconds with 2 pieces of windshield wiper blade. It looks nice but it's not secure.
customer_reviews.author: L. Belle

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product!!! If you are using a controller with this lock, be sure and configure the lock near the controller. Other than that, great device, I can unlock and lock my door from anywhere in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Techguy186

customer_reviews.title: Problem with wireless lock
customer_reviews.text: I think the lock will rate at least 4 stars once I receive the correct Z wave module. My lock arrived with an ATT module and it should have been a universal module. I vould not get the lock to linl with the Samsing Smart Things hub, so I had to contact Yale. They are supposedly going to send me a replacement module and I will send them the ATT module. We'll see how that goes
customer_reviews.author: Gregory T.

customer_reviews.title: Great z-wave home lock
customer_reviews.text: I've had this lock installed on my front entrance door now for about six months. It has worked very well for my family of 5. The installation and programming are very easy and simple. It was also very easy to add it to my home automation system using z-wave. We havent used a key to open or lock it when leaving since installed and the original batteries are going strong. Overall it has a great fit and finish. I highly recommend this for anyone looking for a z-wave keypad lock.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Berkowitz

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well but could be better. It struggles in the winter when seals are cold and you have to pull on the door while locking. Sometimes it stops engaged and when turning the indoor knob you can hear the motor turning. Works well with my Z-wave setup (using Girder 6 and Aeon labs Z stick). The first unit I received broke while connecting the receiver to the main board as it didn't line up properly. I received a replacement unit and it has been fine. My only complaint is the high price.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works well, easy to use. I programmed it with the VeraEdge control unit, was fairly straightforward to setup. I used this lock on the employee access door to our small office/warehouse and the best thing I can say is that after a few days everyone was very comfortable using it. I like that everyone can have their own access code and I can change/remove codes if want to remove an employee's ability to access the building.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: This lock is amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This lock is amazing!!!! The convenience of codes is something I will never be able to not have again. I never have to worry about taking keys with me. It is quick and easy to put in a code for a friend or family that may be stopping by and easy to remove it just as quickly. The no printing is also super nice, so people can't see the numbers more frequently pressed. GET THIS LOCK!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased the lock. Works as expected. I paired it with a Vera lite controller. As a hint you need to create your user pin only after you connected the lock to Veralite. All what you create as pin before the association are deleted (except of course the master pin). Apparently the timer for auto lock can not be set. I found it too long, but perhaps I did not find yet how to do it. Need to call the support most likely A side note, you need a 2 1/8 hole ( 54mm) hole to insert this in your door. I had to red rill a bit as mine was 52mm. Cheers
customer_reviews.author: Zed

customer_reviews.title: Poor instructions and limited functionality
customer_reviews.text: Instructions lacked any explanation of the Z-wave controller, especially the installation of the electronic circuit to make the Z-wave work. At least with the Smart hub, the only thing you can do with it is lock and unlock. No way to change the codes remotely. Deadbolt must be very precisely aligned or it doesn't work. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: O Town Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these. Two works perfectly! Easy to install, and looks and feels really durable. Unfortunately, the third one have a problem with the Z-Wave chip. It doesn't work and I can't pair it with Wink Hub 2. The other 2, I can pair (but it's showing as a Z-Wave lock and not as a Yale lock).
customer_reviews.author: Sol

customer_reviews.title: Locking it is so easy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I have a Danalock that is also good, but this one performs better. I use this with a vera lite (green and white box) and it had to be included and excluded several times before it took fully. Pressing my hand up against the lock to lock it, is easy and fast. I have the vera turn off any zwave light switches when it's locked during the day. With our car not needing a key and now our door not needing a key I feel more efficient.
customer_reviews.author: biogirl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, easy to manage, works perfectly. Have not connected it to an integrated home controller yet but eventually probably will. But just as a single lock on it's own, the convenience of adding/removing codes is really useful. Really great way to give someone temporary access to your house without giving them an actual key. Also nice to program in a few codes in advance so you can let someone in without being at home (and easily remove that code later).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it but could be improved
customer_reviews.text: It's a little quirky to get used to If it actually tracked whose code was used I would really like this and if I could program it from my laptop it sure would make it less quirky and more user friendly I would buy another one as I've had it for close to a year and it's still working fine with one battery change after six months
customer_reviews.author: What in the Sam Houston

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and add to my SmartThings hub
customer_reviews.text: Great door lock. It was easy to install and had no problems connecting to my SmartThings hub. This replaced a kwikset powerbolt lock, and it required no modifications to the door. My only issue is that I wish the keypad was a bit more sensitive. My wife and kids haven't quite gotten used to that so they tend to use the SmartThings app to unlock instead of the keypad. Otherwise a great lock.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: sorry but no way
customer_reviews.text: sorry but after a guest left the lock stopped lighting up and thus I could not use it. its was great until them. I want to return it!
customer_reviews.author: G Leen

customer_reviews.title: The lock itself is great. The Z-wave part in non reliable garbage
customer_reviews.text: The lock itself is great. The Z-wave part in non reliable garbage... Remember you need to purchase the hub also and after you waste hours setting everything up and it still doesn't work correctly you will ask your self why you wasted money on this crap... Stick with the lock, forget about the z-wave.
customer_reviews.author: Bethanne D.

customer_reviews.title: Beware, this lock only has a one year warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this lock in May of 2014. Recently I received a low battery level message. I went ahead and replaced the batteries. Less than one month later, I am again getting the low battery message. I reached out to Yale customer service about this problem and they informed there is nothing they can do since this lock has only a one year warranty. I am very disappointed. The lock is expensive and one would expect it to last a lot longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie Bentley

customer_reviews.title: The lock had been working fine up until then
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this lock in May 2014. We came home one day to find the lock fully dead (batteries had just been recently replaced). We got locked out of our house since we did not bring keys as the lock was fully functional and charged before we left. We had to call a locksmith who had to destroy the lock for us to be able to get in our house. We were charged $170.00. The lock had been working fine up until then. If a lock cannot work beyond 2 years, then its a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Orderer123

customer_reviews.title: Nice lock except mine had a defect.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an office space we had. Out of the box it looked really cool....that's about where it ended. When installing the lock the lock mechanism was busted. When I tried to pull the key out the whole key cylinder pulled out. Needless to say I had to return it. Form and build quality seemed good but execution of the product was lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Best home automation device in my house
customer_reviews.text: Have 2 of these - front and back door - paired with Vera and Revolv. I have a ton of home automation devices and this has brought the most value. Having key option, having flexibility to program thu touchscreen or your automation hub, etc are killer features. I wish there was a way to better control the volume (I've turned mine completely off) but that is very minor compared to functionality, flexibility and style.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Talavera

customer_reviews.title: Lock was great until it stopped being able to automatically turn the ...
customer_reviews.text: Lock was great until it stopped being able to automatically turn the deadbolt. Now it just beeps when it can't automatically unlock and you hear it attempting. to but nothing happens. The lock is just over a year old so wouldn't expect the motor to quit working. Now only way to unlock from outside the house is with the key.
customer_reviews.author: CarolynS

customer_reviews.title: works great with Smartthings hub
customer_reviews.text: Reliable, works great with Smartthings hub. I got the model with the traditional key lock because i wasn't sure if i could trust the electronic lock part... turns out i was being paranoid for no reason. I wish i had purchased the version without the key.
customer_reviews.author: Gunnerdog

customer_reviews.title: I simply love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the ferrari of the z-wave door locks. I have been using this unit for about 2 months now, no issue what-so-ever. I can tell and control the status at all times, configure the unit the way I want, when to lock/unlock and silent or to make keypad noises. amazing piece of device.
customer_reviews.author: myself

customer_reviews.title: A little quirky at first to get used to using ...
customer_reviews.text: A little quirky at first to get used to using. Handy for visitors to not have to give a key. Having to buy a third party hub to connect it to an app to control is the one thing that should be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: RoMeR

customer_reviews.title: It just works
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because the Schlage we tried failed on day two. I've had the Yale installed for a month now and it has worked flawlessly. Easy to pair z-wave with my Tuxedo WIFI Panel. I like the Yale better than the Schlage as it is quieter in operation, and the inside housing is smaller. Nice finish and easy install in existing door.
customer_reviews.author: C. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: From other users, I was worried about the battery life. I saw one report that said to make sure there was nothing to impinge smooth bolt action. It's been working great and I've had it for months now. So easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: K. Pope

customer_reviews.title: This piece is very nice. works seamlessly with my z-wave security panel
customer_reviews.text: This piece is very nice. works seamlessly with my z-wave security panel. but for some reason the wave activation doesn't work. only the hand over the screen. not sure if I didn't set it up correctly or what. but very nice none the less. if the wave worked I'd give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Kyllan

customer_reviews.title: poor quality of touch screen. and poor customer support ( no support)
customer_reviews.text: the touch screen stopped working. it will still light up when resetting, but its sensor is broken, your palm will not wake up the lock. customer service is horrible. refuse to provide and tangible solutions besides "we can offer you a discount on a new lock". i dont think i will take a 5% off on another shitty $200+ lock.
customer_reviews.author: Elfie

customer_reviews.title: Love these - can program up to 250 codes and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these - can program up to 250 codes and connecting to a smarthub to see that it's locked and actually lock it remotely - I have these at my business - no more employee keys that are never returned - great investment
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I've had the Yale z-wave lock installed for about 1.5 years now. It has been a great addition to my home and has worked amazingly well. All the problems I have ever had can be traced back to my z-wave router, and I have never had a problem with the device itself. I love being able to let friends and family into my home whenever they want to come over for a bit while they are in downtown Seattle without having to bother my building manager to let them in. I love it so much, I purchased one for both my front and back entry doors for my condo - it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Pachomius Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Much better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Integrated well with my vera3 home automation system and had no failures or slowness. Simple to set up. Set it up a couple of times now and it's everything I wanted from it's advertised features. You can change out the actual lock itself if you wish - I did so and installed a much more secure system that can't be as easily bumped or picked (Mult-T-Lock).
customer_reviews.author: R Preston

customer_reviews.title: A Great Deadbolt With A Strong Motor
customer_reviews.text: This lock works very well and has a powerful motor. Before installing the new lock, my previous lock was slightly difficult to secure because the deadbolt wasn't perfectly lined up with the frames strike plate. However, after installing this lock, the motor is strong enough to easily turn the deadbolt to completely secure the door. I'm very happy with the lock so far.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeCipher

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, reliable, definitely would buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: We have had this lock for two years now. Changed the battery once. Have never one had a single issue. It’s flawless - and integrates with our FrontPoint system perfectly. For a second home or a home with lots of kids in and out - it’s a great choice. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie McLindon

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup with vera edge controller, fairly quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Easily paired with vera edge controller after installing the included zwave module. Keypad works fine, easy installation with two screws. Very nicely designed and finished, a touch on the large size.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon K

customer_reviews.title: Not good for the price paid
customer_reviews.text: This lock fails all the time. The touch screen goes unresponsible every day and you have to re-try entering the code several times. I don't give it less points because the lock looks nicer than others.
customer_reviews.author: pamb

customer_reviews.title: Real easy to setup and we love having the ability to ...
customer_reviews.text: Real easy to setup and we love having the ability to give others their own code for unlocking the door. Home cleaner, family, etc. Setup was easy
customer_reviews.author: NIckgd1

customer_reviews.title: Love this lock
customer_reviews.text: Love this lock. So very elegant only issue is that you'd need to buy a matching handle from the manufacturer (Yale lock) and their website sucks
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Y.

customer_reviews.title: Defective? or only great for 5 months
customer_reviews.text: It was great...until it didn't work 5 months later. I purchased from Amazon and am wondering my lock is defective, since it has only been used for such a short time.
customer_reviews.author: brneyesblu

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: broke within 9 months ... bolt action will not fully retract when using the 'keyless' feature
customer_reviews.author: Top Sleep

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: A month has not passed since we installed the deadbolt, and we already replaced the batteries twice. Twelve batteries in 29 days; very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica C. Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: mine stopped working
customer_reviews.text: i loved the item when i got it but it stopped working the key pad worked when it wanted to, not sure if i got a bad one or if they all stop working i returned it back and bought a kwikset one which i didnt like as much as the yale but the kwikset is still working a year later. i liked the construction of the yale one but didnt work out for me im waiting to see one on sale to give them another shot and see if it was just a bad one i got and i called yale but they didnt help me.
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: ... looking for a lock I could integrate into a smart device environment and someone suggested this
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a lock I could integrate into a smart device environment and someone suggested this. It has been a great choice that was easy to install, configure with codes, and add to the network. The lock looks great on the door and the touch screen is responsive to the specific wake gesture.
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: The YRD220-ZW-619 looks amazing and works like a smart lock should work
customer_reviews.text: The YRD220-ZW-619 looks amazing and works like a smart lock should work! I purchased the shiny brass option and I have to say it is one of the better looking locks I have ever installed. I paired it with a veralite smart home hub and is disconnects at times but I believe that is the fault of vera lite. Would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: hawaiifiveo

customer_reviews.title: Love this lock
customer_reviews.text: I love this lock. It was very easy to install and works great with my Samsung Smarthub. It opens by key, code or smartphone. I am using the front door to enter my home more often, just so I can use this lock!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Im giving this a 4 star since I have owned ...
customer_reviews.text: Im giving this a 4 star since I have owned 2 and bought one for my father as well, but the unit appeared used. Amazon returned with no issues and he decided he wanted actual buttons instead.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As described. Thank you and will do business again soon...
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Great Lock! very easy to install and Z-wave setup ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Lock! very easy to install and Z-wave setup was to my home security system controller was as easy and effortless. This is probably the best Z-wave deadbolt I have seen. Initially purchased Schlage deadbolt but returned it due to complexity with integration into my controller. This was a lot simpler that Schlage.
customer_reviews.author: Wahid Ullah

customer_reviews.title: Best z-wave product on the market
customer_reviews.text: Purchased three. High quality easy install. Using with Vera Edge. probably the most stable z-wave device we have. The touch screen works great even in direct sun.
customer_reviews.author: Scottie J Melancon

customer_reviews.title: I love this touchscreen deadbolt
customer_reviews.text: I love this touchscreen deadbolt. It makes my door looks very sophisticated. I have being using it for about 3 years and it is like new. The four stars is because the batteries do not last long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Davila

customer_reviews.title: Installed this, works great with Vera
customer_reviews.text: Using with micasaverde vera 3 - works like a champ. It was easy to install, even for people who aren't handy. Warning: If you have to nudge your door a bit every time you bolt it today, you may need to make some adjustments when you install this. You won't be there to nudge it if you want to lock remotely.
customer_reviews.author: Kristian Burkhardt

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and was happy I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy Lockett

customer_reviews.title: Absolute great piece of z-wave equipment!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely one of my favorite products that I own in my house. I have it paired with both my Samsung Smart Hub and my Vivint Sky panel. It works flawlessly!
customer_reviews.author: dpk

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: One year in: I love this thing. It's still got the battery from the first day, and easily linked to my 2Gig alarm panel.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T Cox

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome! Using it at a rental property with mycasaverde ...
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! Using it at a rental property with mycasaverde installed. Very easy to unlock/ lock, change pins, get alerts. So far battery life is fine and I can view the battery status remotely. Would HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: bobbycees

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and nice product
customer_reviews.text: I like quality, I dont like that it drains battery very soon and lose connection very often with my smart things. everything else is OK
customer_reviews.author: ldiablovtr

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Previously owned a Schlage z-wave lock and it stopped working on the z-wave network after 3 weeks. This lock was easy to install and is much quieter than the Schlage when opening and closing. It also talks to you during setup so that phase is much easier. I love this lock.
customer_reviews.author: gbf17116

customer_reviews.title: Satrified with this lock
customer_reviews.text: this lock is installed with a z-wave based vera light controller. install & set up were relatively straight forward. after 6+ months the unit has worked without issue, and I'm using the original set of batteries.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product in conjunction with my Smartthings Hub. Got it all set up for our tenants. I'm able to monitor when it's unlocked and locked from my app. I love the feature of one touch locking. This unit has only been installed for two months so no issues yet regarding battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The touch screen can fail when exposed to hot sun.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bateni

customer_reviews.title: Great lock
customer_reviews.text: We own tow of these. I originally got one for the front door and my wife liked it so much she insisted we get one for teh back door as well. Hooked into our home alarm system. Remotely controllable. Wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Steven VanTill

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It's exactly what I was looking for for my rental home. No need for a key and it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Christina L Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Quickly and flawlessly connected to my vera lite controller with all the bells and whistles ready to optimize
customer_reviews.author: Sir Fritz Bumwallah

customer_reviews.title: Great lock. Well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Great lock. Well constructed, easy to program, works great with the Vera Edge system. I recommend replacing the key cylinder with a high security cylinder to match the level of security that the digital keypad offers.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Great functionally, fit, and finish
customer_reviews.text: As expected this was easy to install. The surprise was how easy it was to configure it. You choose the master code and then the voice activated menus walk you thru the rest. It can also be configured via the z-wave interface, I almost gave it a 4 because the touch screen leaves fingerprints behind (the only advantage the competition has) but the quality and look make up for this. My whole family agreed that the Yale looked better than the competitive produce I'd installed (and subsequently returned) prior to this lock.
customer_reviews.author: Turnepf

customer_reviews.title: Keyless greatness!
customer_reviews.text: No keys for the car, no keys for the house, this is perfect! easy installation, easy setup, and now everyone has their own code. Looks better than other clunky solutions with physical buttons and can be integrated with a home automation system if desired.
customer_reviews.author: JAG

customer_reviews.title: I have had this lock for 2. 5 years ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this lock for 2.5 years now and I am completely impressed that it still functions as the first day I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Talisman

customer_reviews.title: Keyless is great
customer_reviews.text: Love the vocal instructions in setup. Works great With z-Wave you can check from anywhere to confirm if door is locked. Don't have rely on your brain to remember if you locked the door.
customer_reviews.author: Lesflys

customer_reviews.title: Great lock, no hassles
customer_reviews.text: Very easy install/program. Looks great. Joined and works great with my z-wave network. Very pleased with the device.
customer_reviews.author: LSLBoater

customer_reviews.title: What a great purchase....A+
customer_reviews.text: This item really is a godsend. I own an office with multiple employees. Over the years I've had to let employees go, and with that -the fear that an employee has the key. This lock lets the owner just delete their code. The lock is VERY easy to program, and VERY easy to connect to a hub (I use SmartThings for the office). It's amazing to know when this lock is in its locked or unlocked position...that you can have different codes per user...and that you can remotely lock or unlock this lock by your mobile phone. I receive and review items all of the time, this was one of the best.
customer_reviews.author: PKC

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: product received without dead bolt part and keys were missing
customer_reviews.author: mlvv

customer_reviews.title: Crappy Locking System
customer_reviews.text: The YRD220-ZW-619 consistently locks up and prevents access to your own house - which is pretty much a sign of crappy locking system. I reset the system several times and the same issue occurred. Sometimes, it would work fine; but a lock that prevents access to your own house at least once a week is tempermental at best. I attempted to contact Yale Real Living several times and never once spoke with a real person - just a computer voice system. None of my best were ever answered so I would rate Yale Real Living customer service at 0 stars. Terrible lock with terrible customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Dunne

customer_reviews.title: Great lock. Looks good, works with Casa Verde
customer_reviews.text: Nice styling and a good deal for a combo lock with actual motor driven dead bolt. Easy to use and program. I can operate it remotely via Casa Verde and my android app.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Wood

customer_reviews.title: Interesting product
customer_reviews.text: quality product, easy to assemble, i took ten minutes, Programmin with Vera Lite is simple. another 15 minutes. Many adventages compared to the system keyboard buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago Rusiñol

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to program and ties in to most home automation systems (Control4, etc.).
customer_reviews.author: Natalya

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install real simple to hook up to a Vera lite. Has good feature just turn off voice and noises. Screen is very visible during the day which was a concern for me before I purchased. Glad with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: CBO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Connected to my z-wave device very quickly Everything as promised
customer_reviews.author: LouDe

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: I had to fit this into an existing deadlock set of holes so was rather worried. It fitted like a charm and worked beautifully. Product great and solid and instructions clear. the only criticism I have is that while I like the auto-rock it would be nic eto re-program the timer from 30 sec without having to use Z wave - which I don't have. 30' is a bit short
customer_reviews.author: Jing Sun

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and program
customer_reviews.text: Quick installation, and easy to program. Works great with SmartThings hub. Looking forward to getting more of these for the house.
customer_reviews.author: pshay

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it's good.
customer_reviews.text: Battery ran out very quickly with minimal use. Otherwise it's good.

customer_reviews.title: ... it connected to my ADT service and it works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: Got it connected to my ADT service and it works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: farieraven

customer_reviews.title: and absolutely loved it. Durable and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Had this lock for about 2 years now, and absolutely loved it. Durable and reliable, and best of all, I was able to pair this to the new Wink network router via the generic Z-Wave interface. Very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Designer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely the best zwave controlled door lock I've found
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the best zwave controlled door lock I've found. Integrates easily with my Vera Edge, programming and installation is easy. Unfortunately I had to take two stars off because as with most residential locks this can be bumped. There is also a seemingly impressive video showing it can be picked with a paper clip, this isn't really any easier and is in fact slower than bumping. Most of the anti-bump features out there don't work anyway, this is the simple reality of home deadbolts/locks. They simply slow/delay entry and won't prevent a determined/skilled intruder. I combine my locks with a home security system.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Fread

customer_reviews.title: very touchy
customer_reviews.text: you must enter you pin slow with 2 sec delay in between digits or you'll get a message saying "wrong number of digits" as you struggle to get in your warm house , get the push button instead it works well , also auto lock kept reseting to off and z wave dropped off
customer_reviews.author: JORDAN D.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LOCK
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lock, zwave compatible device works great.... easy to install everything works fine as described. Works with other zwave devices nicely... very high tech worth the price. Would buy again

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Took 20 minutes. Nice touch screen and user friendly interface. Easy to hard reset if fyou need to.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This lock was very easy to install and program. Z Wave linked up immediately. Well made and good looking. Very good customer support.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible you cannot use the Z-Wave function which is a ...
customer_reviews.text: Z-Wave does not work properly at all. You cannot control the lock as there is about 10mins of lag on the control. Horrible you cannot use the Z-Wave function which is a pity.
customer_reviews.author: statepkt

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Works perfect with SmartThings and the battery ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Works perfect with SmartThings and the battery life has been great, even in cold weather. The screen works perfectly in 2 degrees or 110. Makes the days of carrying keys a thing of the past.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great. My home alarm company wanted to charge me$ 299.00 to buy and install this. them charge me $5.99 a month to use. I got this and put it in. It works fantastic with keypad codes. Love this!

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: These do not fit on Aluminum doors! I bought three and now I'm stuck them,. they do not fit!!!

customer_reviews.text: I've had to reprogram this lock at least a million times. Loses it's programming for no reason over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Calvin Roberts

customer_reviews.title: worked flawlessly for 1+year. had to change the batteries ...
customer_reviews.text: worked flawlessly for 1+year. had to change the batteries once. I m not using the remote capabilities, I am concerned with hacking potential.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ramshaw

customer_reviews.title: POS... Died 1.5 month after warranty expired
customer_reviews.text: POS... Died 1.5 month after warranty expired. Keypad will not activate, replacing battery and changing privacy does not work. Lifetime warranty on finish isn't usable if the unit doesn't function.
customer_reviews.author: Dissatisfied

customer_reviews.title: defective, so disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: thankfully returns through amazon aren't too difficult. although the reveiws are consistently good for this lock, I never got mine to work. on closer inspection, I noticed that there is a small, weak looking washer that holds the inner turn latch to the outer escutcheon. mne was clearly broken and the pin would never catch, and fall off. This lock never would or could mechanically function w/o a new barrel. I normally would request an exchange, and even thought about having the locksmith repair it, but having seen far better barrel mechanisms, I don't trust this one to hold up to the test of time and wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Godzilla

product_meta.title: Yale Security YRD226ZW2619 Assure Lock Touchscreen Deadbolt with Z-Wave Plus, Satin Nickel
product_meta.description: Yale Real Living Simplifies Home Security. Yale Real Living™ touchscreen keypad locks work with a variety of home control or home security systems. With Real Living, the lock becomes the first point of contact for security and home control. Design Features - Durable acrylic touchscreen - Illuminated touchscreen and keypad for night time access - For use on all standard interior and exterior doors - Tapered bolt accommodates misaligned doors Lock Features - Standalone touchscreen keypad locking device - Touchscreen: trilingual in English, Spanish, French - High-tech look and feel - Adjustable volume level - Easy to use, install and program - 25 users for stand alone version - Privacy mode - One year battery life (4 AA batteries) - Deadbolt motor - motorized bolt in and out - Low battery warning Product specifications Door Specs:
feature_bullets: Lock and unlock your door with ease using the touchscreen keypad. Works with Z-Wave alarm and automation systems including SmartThings and wink
Installs in minutes with just a screwdriver
Touchscreen keypad: backlit and capacitive touch so that numbers won't ever wear off
Lock and check lock status with Amazon Alexa when used with SmartThings or wink
Voice Guided programming in English, French or Spanish

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars211 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
